title: Jaycoinz
author: Jaycoinz
content: Greetings everyone am so happy to be in this forum.In reality Bitcoin has greatly contribute greatly to the life's of individual who engage in crypto currency marketing. Before I join this forum I was opportune to trade in Bitcoin and I found out that Bitcoin is really a top of cryptocurrency. Even in this forum I have learnt more about Bitcoin and I urge every one of us to deal with Bitcoin as it will contribute more value to us.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Welcome buddy! Read the rules to maximize your stay here.ELI5 lessons to  - https://learnmeabitcoin.com/If you like reading books - https://aantonop.com/books/iom/Compiled resources about BTC - https://www.lopp.net/Security lessons - https://cryptosec.info/

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 12:33:57 PMGreetings everyone am so happy to be in this forum.In reality Bitcoin has greatly contribute greatly to the life's of individual who engage in crypto currency marketing. Before I join this forum I was opportune to trade in Bitcoin and I found out that Bitcoin is really a top of cryptocurrency. Even in this forum I have learnt more about Bitcoin and I urge every one of us to deal with Bitcoin as it will contribute more value to us.Welcome to the forum and be sure you have read all the rules first before making any post because most newbie today don't just read the forum rules before making a post  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0Well this is the right place, if you intend in improving yourself in every aspect of the crypto world thats including the trading of bitcoin and other cryptos. just be sure you ask all the necessary question you feel you dont know and gladfully someone here in the forum have an answer to your questions.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Let me also drop my little contribution to you here while you make your stay here worthwhile, the forum is an interesting community just as you have found bitcoin to be, bitcoin has the bearish and bullish period whereby you have to study them to always know when to set in which is why it's been volatile, and know that learning is a continuous thing that is needed with bitcoin and the forum as well here, this two links will help your stay on the forum a deserving one.Posting etiquetteshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5184741.0#post_altgiveawayBeginners and Help Encyclopediahttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5364418.0#post_point118

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: welcome guys. and if before you join this forum you are used to trading Bitcoin. So I think this forum will not seem foreign to you. and you will definitely be able to adapt and discuss well in this forum. And yeah it's quite nice that those of us who are interested in bitcoin can gather in this forum. because even there are many out there who don't have friends to talk about bitcoin. and in this forum we can discuss freely about bitcoin. as long as we comply with the rules in this forum. avoid spam, don't go out of topic and never plagiarism.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 12:33:57 PMGreetings everyone am so happy to be in this forum.In reality Bitcoin has greatly contribute greatly to the life's of individual who engage in crypto currency marketing. Before I join this forum I was opportune to trade in Bitcoin and I found out that Bitcoin is really a top of cryptocurrency. Even in this forum I have learnt more about Bitcoin and I urge every one of us to deal with Bitcoin as it will contribute more value to us.welcome to bitcointalk forum. If you wish to enjoy the forum to the forum then you must first learn about the forum's rules and regulations and also learn what each board are for and which type of post is accepted in a certain board those that are not accepted. Here' the forum's Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ While if you intend to learn more about Bitcoin then you should consider checking out the following links provided below;Beginners & Help Encyclopediahttps://www.bitcoin.com/get-startedhttps://coindesk.com/learnhttps://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbook#chaptershttps://theinternetofmoney.info

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: There's many ways to learn about Bitcoin, you just need to choose which one you're interested.You can learn Bitcoin through video https://www.youtube.com/@aantonopYou can learn Bitcoin through books https://aantonop.com/books/iom/You can learn Bitcoin through articles https://coindesk.com/learnIMO it's better for you to learn the difference between Bitcoin and fiat first, when you're already know the reason, you wouldn't regret to invest in Bitcoin.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 12:33:57 PMEven in this forum I have learnt more about Bitcoin and I urge every one of us to deal with Bitcoin as it will contribute more value to us.You have other account also on forum because you have registered on the forum today and saying learnt a lot about bitcoin from this forum? Just want to ask about this but you have already been provided with lot of useful resources to learn about bitcoin but I would also like to add  Mastering Bitcoin  as this book will take you on bitcoin journey from noob to pro explaining most of the parts about it.This thread by @fillippone is also useful for newbies: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5156874.0Rest best wishes and hope you learn about it and grow on the forum as well.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 12:33:57 PMGreetings everyone am so happy to be in this forum.I agree, it is great to be a part of this community! I hope you will continue to stay involved, because it is always interesting to hear about other people's experiences trading in Bitcoin. For example, do you have any specific strategies that you follow? Also, do you have previous experience in trading? Thanks again for sharing your thoughts and welcome to the forum!

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 12:33:57 PMGreetings everyone am so happy to be in this forum.In reality Bitcoin has greatly contribute greatly to the life's of individual who engage in crypto currency marketing. Before I join this forum I was opportune to trade in Bitcoin and I found out that Bitcoin is really a top of cryptocurrency. Even in this forum I have learnt more about Bitcoin and I urge every one of us to deal with Bitcoin as it will contribute more value to us.I'm still at the learning stage of Bitcoin and one thing I try not to do is give strict or straight suggestions when it comes to financial issues especially Bitcoin which is very volatile bit since you're here, I believe you already have the primary knowledge of the journey you're about embarking on and the high volatility involved I will also advice that you take more of your time to invest in learning about Bitcoin and cryprocurrency in general because it is more complex than it seems and you should learn about keeping your coins save and always try to use decentralized exchanges and also remember to protect your key as there is a slogan that "not your key, not your coins".Always do your own research (DYOR) As no one will be liable for any mistake or loss you make.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: I usually caution newbies who create thread like this to have an information filter where they can skim through all the available resources, find out what's useful to them and consume the information at a workable pace; this way you avoid information overload which can dissuade newer members from using the forum anymore.There are tons of information shared on this thread, more on the forum and even more on the internet. Find what interests you and stick to that, with time you can expand your interests.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: First don’t start trading bitcoin first then come back and ask for advice on Bitcoin, we all may have our own different schools of thought but I believe Trading a a very risky business to go into without the right knowledge about it.Learning never stops and even after you have checked out the links and site already suggested to you, you should still be seeking advices as your keep pushing in knowledge.
